body:
Two of us figured out a way to break the block limit in Cavum.


1. MY way: build to spec spawn, block glitch to top and build(ONLY ONE LAYER YOU CANNOT BUILD)
2. Using pistons (pinnapple203 way), you can block glitch and build with slabs: explain further someone else please

k thats all

please fix :)

title: Breaking block limit

replies.body:

And block glitching isn't allowed anyway
